vlive.korean: 우리 원스들 2020년도 행복하자! ONCE, let's be happy in 2020 as well! 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "모모’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: ONCE, let's be happy in 2020 as well!
